title: minecraft崩溃
txt_content:
我安装了flan mod，一进入游戏就这样。

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
A full error report has been saved to C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-03-11_21.54.59-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 34366a37 --------
Full report at:
C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-03-11_21.54.59-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!
Generated 13-3-11 下午9:54
-- System Details --
Details:
 Minecraft Version: 1.4.7
 Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
 Java Version: 1.7.0_15, Oracle Corporation
 Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
 Memory: 398470048 bytes (380 MB) / 502005760 bytes (478 MB) up to 2112618496 bytes (2014 MB)
 JVM Flags: 3 total; -Xincgc -Xms512m -Xmx2048m
 AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
 Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed

 mcp [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
 FML [Forge Mod Loader] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
 Forge [Minecraft Forge] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
 LainCraft [LainCraft] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
 mod_TooManyItems [mod_TooManyItems] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
 mod_ReiMinimap [mod_ReiMinimap] ([1.4.6]ReiMinimap_v3.2_06_CN(sy).zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
 FlansMod [Flan's Mod] (Flans Mod 2.1.1 for Minecraft 1.4.7 Universal汉化.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
 ParachuteMod [Parachute Mod] (parachute-1.4.7-forge-497.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
 LWJGL: 2.4.2
 OpenGL: GeForce GTX 650 Ti/PCIe/SSE2 GL version 4.2.0, NVIDIA Corporation
 Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'forge,fml'
 Type: Client (map_client.txt)
 Texture Pack: faithful32pack.zip
 Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
 Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
java.lang.RuntimeException: The requested image path /icons/AA12Ammo.png is not found
 at cpw.mods.fml.client.TextureFXManager.loadImageFromTexturePack(TextureFXManager.java:304)
 at cpw.mods.fml.client.TextureFXManager.registerTextureOverrides(TextureFXManager.java:242)

replies.author: sjjklh
replies.txt_content:
那是制作内容包的人自己的问题
你随便弄个子弹的图片保存到/icons/AA12Ammo.png
icons文件夹的位置位于这个内容包里

replies.author: mmwar3
replies.txt_content:
ava.lang.RuntimeException: The requested image path /icons/AA12Ammo.png is not found
更换个材质包试试

mmwar3 发表于 2013-3-12 12:13 
ava.lang.RuntimeException: The requested image path /icons/AA12Ammo.png is not found
更换个材质包试 ...
我是打不开啊{:10_493:}

sjjklh 发表于 2013-3-12 13:09 
那是制作内容包的人自己的问题
你随便弄个子弹的图片保存到/icons/AA12Ammo.png
icons文件夹的位置位于这 ...
谢谢。我去试试

replies.author: mmwar3
replies.txt_content:
1114789656 发表于 2013-3-12 13:00 
我是打不开啊
就是材质包的问题导致你打不开的啊，，你删了那个 faithful这个材质包再启动，系统会用默认的启动的，如果能打开，就去下别的好看的材质包呗

mmwar3 发表于 2013-3-12 13:21 
就是材质包的问题导致你打不开的啊，，你删了那个 faithful这个材质包再启动，系统会用默认的启动的，如果 ...
谢谢，但是不是这个原因。刚才的朋友帮我解决了
